onyomiExamples.meaning: stick-to-itiveness, perseverance, persistence, radical (esp. one that tends to ionize easily), root, indriya (faculty of the body having a specific function, i.e. the sensory organs)
foundation, root, basis, core, fundamentals, root and trunk

kunyomiExamples.meaning: root (of a plant), root (of a tooth, hair, etc.), center (of a pimple, etc.), root (of all evil, etc.), source, origin, cause, basis, one's true nature, (fishing) reef
to come from, to have roots in
